players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a bold lie, Alice. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's innocent. Why are you trying to frame me?"

Diana: "Alice, if you're really the detective, can you explain why you chose to investigate Charlie specifically on Night 1? And Charlie, if you investigated me, then you should know I'm a villager - so who do you think the real mafioso is?"

Diana: "Alice's immediate claim to have found the mafioso on Night 1 seems too convenient. Charlie's counter-claim and his investigation of me (which would confirm I'm innocent) feels more credible. I'm leaning toward voting Alice."

You: "Diana, Charlie is lying. I am the real detective. If he investigated you and confirmed you're innocent, why didn't he say that in his first statement? He only said it after I accused him. He's scrambling."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me instead of a random player? That makes no sense. I investigated Diana to confirm an innocent. Diana, trust me, Alice is lying."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
